generated_doNotEdit.title: Take Flower Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to accept flowers from another mob with the minecraft:offer_flower behavior.

fields.title: Filters
fields.description: Conditions that need to be met for the behavior to start.

fields.title: Max Head Rotation Y
fields.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.

fields.title: Max Rotation X
fields.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

fields.title: Max Wait Time
fields.description: The maximum amount of time (in seconds) for the mob to randomly wait for before taking the flower.

fields.title: Min Distance To Target
fields.description: Minimum distance (in blocks) for the entity to be considered having reached its target.

fields.title: Min Wait Time
fields.description: The minimum amount of time (in seconds) for the mob to randomly wait for before taking the flower.

fields.title: Take Flower
fields.description: Event triggered when the entity takes a flower from another entity.

fields.title: Search Area
fields.description: The dimensions of the AABB used to search for a potential mob to take a flower from.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
